      Base class for Actions.

      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  AimAction
      Special action for aiming at other actors
      class  AttackAction
      Special Action for attacking other Actors.

      Special Action that allows actor to craft a weapon
      class  EatAction
      Special Action that allows Actor to eat and recover health points.

      Special Action for fertilizing an unripe Crop to decrease the time left to ripe.
      class  FireRangedWeaponAction
      Special Action that allows Actor to fire ranged weapon.
      class  FireShotgunAction
      Special Action that allows Actor to fire shotgun towards the direction chosen.
      class  FireSniperRifleAction
      Special Action for firing sniper rifle
      class  HarvestAction
      Special Action that allows Actor to harvest a ripe crop for food.
      class  QuitGameAction
      Special Action that allows Player to quit the game.
      class  ShootAction
      Special action for shooting at actors
      class  SowAction
      Special Action for sowing a Crop.

      Special Action or summoning Zombie
      class  VanishAction
      Special action for an actor to vanish
